description: This file defines the LoadBalancer class, which manages AWS Elastic Load Balancer resources, including creation, reading, deletion, and post-operation handling. It interacts with AWS via boto3 and uses custom utility modules for logging and console output.

classes.name: LoadBalancer
classes.description: Represents an AWS Elastic Load Balancer, providing methods to create, read, delete, and manage the resource lifecycle.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the AWS Load Balancer with specified parameters, handling subnets, security groups, and other configurations.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the Load Balancer to be fully created and available, then retrieves its DNS name.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the Load Balancer from AWS.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the Load Balancer from AWS.

methods.name: post_delete
methods.description: Waits for the Load Balancer to be fully deleted.

methods.name: get_arn
methods.description: Retrieves the ARN of the Load Balancer.
